price: Kwa hakika tumevifanya vilioko juu ya ardhi kuwa ni pambo lake ili tuwafanyie mtihani, ni nani kati yao wenye vitendo vizuri zaidi.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا مَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ زِينَةٗ لَّهَا لِنَبۡلُوَهُمۡ أَيُّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗا
footnotes: Sisi tumewaumba kwa kheri na shari, na tumevifanya vilio juu ya ardhi ni pambo lake kwa ajili ya manufaa ya watu wake. Hivyo tunawatendea vitendo kama ni mtihani wapate kudhihiri kati yao wenye a'mali njema. Basi aliye pumbazwa na ulimwengu, na asiishughulikie Akhera, huwa amepotea. Na aliye iamini Akhera, huyo huwa ameongoka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā mā ʿalā al-arḍi zīnatan lahā linabluwahum ayyuhum aḥsanu ʿamalan
